channel.title: automation on Yak Shaving
channel.description: Recent content in automation on Yak Shaving

item.title: How to trigger event with WebdriverIO
item.description: Besides Shadow DOM support, WebdriverIO has the edge when it comes to writing javascript through the common execute function, as you write javascript natively not as a string between dummy double or single quotes in the case of java and other languages, so you don’t have to worry about syntax errors, along with leveraging autocompletion among other features that your IDE provides.

item.title: Close Browser With Selenium
item.description: There are a couple of different ways you can close the browser session in selenium:
